thread.title: Benjamin Northrup
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Benjamin Northrup

author: Benjamin Northrup
title: Benjamin Northrup
text: I've had nothing but great experiences at Bundlestars. Great prices, and the bundles generally fit the theme, and have at least a few Good, well known games, with some hidden gems and the occasional bad game thrown in. Its great for trying new things, or scoring a good deal on some titles you might have missed. I check bundlestars before I go anywhere else!
